name: Where is my mind
description:
#indiesvspewdiepie

The head of Bob the Zombi is inside the security room of the museum, he has to guide his body to his head to finally be in one piece !

Try to avoid the Zombies Hunters robots on your way and join the mind to the body !

Good luck !

Credits:

  • Antoine SEMBLAT (Twitter / Patreon)
  • Aubry GRIEGER (Twitter)
  • Willy BOUN
  • Music by Badass Wolf Shirt (Soundclound)
